RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 20000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTRY LADY set a clear pace while well in hand around the turn, then widened through the lane while hanging on her left lead under moderate hand urging. PRAY FOR US chased in the three path, bid for place three wide and between horses at the furlong pole, dueled with an outer rival late, and prevailed. MIA ANTONIA chased in the four path, then stayed on late to vie for place nearing the wire, but missed. HIGHLY WICKED bumped the outer part of the gate and was slow to recover, lagged behind early on, picked up stride along the fence around the turn, shifted off of the rail at the three sixteenths pole, sustained a bid for place two wide and between horses at the furlong grounds, but flattened out. MADISON'S SCREEN broke slowly, pulled inside of rivals to be the clear leader's closest pursuer after the opening stages, stalked outside of her around the turn, but failed to keep pace while drifting inwardly in upper stretch, and weakened in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Country Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Respect the Valleys LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set clear pace, in hand turn, widened upr, left lead, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Pray for Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3p, place bid btwn 1/8, dueled, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Madison's Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start,pulled ins,stalk 2w,outpaced/shifted in upr,wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Antonia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4p, stayed on late, place bid, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Wicked
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd gate/slow early,trail,rail gain turn,plc bid btw1/8,flattend

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 51000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 13 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUITAR WOMAN set the pace along the inside, met a mild bid from an outer foe turning for home, yet swiftly repelled that foe entering the lane, and drew off under driving pressure. SHE TOLD YOU SO hopped slightly while off slow at the start, tracked along the inside, gained place leaving the three sixteenths pole, and chased the leader home while securing that position. AGAMI stalked two wide, inched closer under an all-out drive around the far turn to be off of the leader's flank turning for home, but failed to keep pace entering the lane, and tired. GRIDDY UP GIRL tracked two to three wide, but faded around the far turn. DOLLY'S GUITAR hesitated at the start, trailed while rank behind rivals around the first turn, then weakened in the late stages without factoring.

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Woman
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, repelled rival 3/16, drew off, driving

ENTRY.NAME: She Told You So
ENTRY.OWNER: Bockmon Danny and Joey Foster Racing and Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight hop/slow start, tracked inside, place bid 3/16, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Agami
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd,inched closer/driven 2nd,mild bid1/4,repelled,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dolly's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, trailed, rank 1st, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Griddy Up Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2-3wd, faded 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 25000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LORD CAPTAIN set the pace inside of a vying rival nearing the backstretch, inched clear in the two path at the three furlong pole, was roused to draw off entering the lane, responded readily, and was put to wraps a sixteenth from home. IZEONDEC leaned in and shied to avoid brushing an inner rival, wound up spotting the field multiple lengths early on upon recovery, lagged behind in the four path, gained into the far turn, fanned to the five path turning for home, reached place at the three sixteenths pole as the clear leader kicked further away, and ran on to prove second best. KING TUFF vied for the lead the three to two wide around the first turn, pressed down the backstretch, chased the clearing leader from between horses around the far turn, shifted out leaving the quarter pole while forging place, but was outkicked by an outer rival in upper stretch. KLIMTOMANIAC broke a step slow and rushed an outer rival at the start, tracked in the two to three path early on, but trailed around the far turn, then improved between tiring rivals in midstretch. PATH TO SUCCESS broke a bit out at the start, stalked outside of the leading trio, chased the clear pace setter from the four path around the far turn, but shied from an inner rival leaving the quarter pole, and yielded between horses. SEEKING SPLENDOR took a nudge from an inner rival at the start, stalked along the inside, but faded turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Captain
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins,inched clear 2p3/8,roused 1/4,drew off,wrappd up1/16

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Moreau Bloodstock Int'l Inc. & White Bloodstock LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Klimtomaniac
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow/brushed foe start,tracked 2-3p,trail 2nd,improvd btw1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking Splendor
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, stalked inside, faded 5/16

ENTRY.NAME: King Tuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3-2wd 1st,pressed,chased btw 2nd,shiftd out1/4,outkicked upr

ENTRY.NAME: Izeondec
ENTRY.COMMENT: leand in/shied start,lagged 4p,gain 4-5p2nd,up place3/16,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Path to Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke bit out,stalked 4-3w1st,chased 4p2nd,shied 1/4,yielded btw

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PSEUDOSCIENCE settled off of the pace along the inside while a bit off of the rail, faltered between horses at the nine sixteenths pole to be far back into the far turn, yet commenced a rally with five sixteenths to go, swung to the six path and outside of the leaders entering the lane, and sustained his charge to drive past them inside the final furlong. ONECALLTHATSALL broke a step slowly, trailed along the inside, improved inside of rivals at the nine sixteenths pole, steadily progressed in the four path around the far turn, produced a bid leaving the furlong grounds along with an outer menacing rival, but was outkicked by that foe entering the final sixteenth. REINA ACES stalked outside of the embattled leading pair early on, produced an early bid for the lead at the half mile pole as an outer ZIPPING MOLLY forced her hand, showed the way in the two path from that vying rival around the far turn, shook clear entering the lane, but was collared by a pair of outer bidders at the sixteenth pole, and weakened. ONE MO TO GO dueled for the lead two wide, but failed to keep pace with a pair of outer bidders with a half mile to go, chased those sparring foes around the far turn, but tired turning for home. ZIPPING MOLLY tracked four wide, moved forward to bid for the lead at the half mile pole, dueled with an inner rival while in the three path around the far turn, but failed to keep pace entering the lane, and weakened between horses entering the final furlong. ROSIE SPRIT dueled for the lead along the inside, but was overhauled by a pair of bidders at the half mile pole, and steadily weakened around the far turn. TAZZHER lacked speed in the three path, yet faded around the far turn. TAKEOVER TIME raced far back in the four to five path around the first turn, then was outrun thereafter, and eased through the lane. JAZZ JAZZ JAZZ momentarily lost his balance leaving the gates causing her to break a step slow, raced far back while floated from the five to six path around the far turn, showed little thereafter, and was also eased through the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Pseudoscience
ENTRY.OWNER: Jeansonne Justin Virgadamo Rodney and Bonura Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins-2p,falterd btw9/16,rally 5/16,6p3/16,drove past1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz Jazz Jazz
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start/step slow, far back 5-6p1st, showed little, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie Sprit
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, overhauled 1/2, wknd 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: One Mo to Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd, outkicked 1/2, chased 2nd, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tazzher
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2w-3p, faded 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3p,bid 3wd btw1/2,dueld ins foe-2p2nd,cleard3/16,wknd1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Takeover Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back 4-5p1st, outrun, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Onecallthatsall
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow st,trail ins,midpack 9/16,gain 4p2nd,bid btw1/8,outkckd

ENTRY.NAME: Zipping Molly
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p,bid 4w1/2,dueled 2w-3p2nd,outpaced 3/16,wknd btw1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR FOUR YEAR OLD FILLIES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIA BABY broke out at the start, stalked the leading pair three wide, bid at the five sixteenths pole, kicked clear in upper stretch, and safely held sway from a chasing rival through the late stages. WHY BEHAVE hopped and broke a few lengths slow at the start, tracked along the inside, tipped four wide entering the lane after MIA BABY struck the front, chased that foe to claim place at the furlong grounds, and ran on to prove second best. SIKUM vied for the lead inside of a rival, but was outkicked by a separate outer challenger entering the lane, and lost place leaving the furlong pole while giving way. PI YO PRINCESS settled off of the pace in the two path, came into the lane in the four path, and moved up between horses in upper stretch. TEXAS TIDELANDS brushed an inner rival at the start, trailed around the turn, swung to the six path entering the lane, and improved between horses leaving midstretch. SASSY EMMA chased from midpack four wide, but bore out to the seven path entering the lane, and faded. MEDWAY QUEEN took a light brush from an outer rival at the start, vied two wide, but was outkicked by an outer rival nearing the lane, and weakened between horses entering it.

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, stalked 3wd, bid 5/16, cleared upper, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: WinStar Farm, LLC & Larry B. Taylor

ENTRY.NAME: Why Behave
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped/slow start, tracked ins, 4w1/4, chased, up place 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Sikum
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside foe, outkicked 1/4, lost place 1/8, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Pi Yo Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins-2p, 4p1/4, moved up btwn upr

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased midpack 4wd, bore out 7p1/4, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Medway Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Crown's Way Racing LLC and South Side Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, vied 2wd, outkicked 5/16, wknd btwn 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Tidelands
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start, trailed, 6p1/4, improved btwn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALE hopped and broke a step slowly at the start, pressed three wide approaching the half mile pole, gained an advantage while tucking two wide entering the turn, cleared while well in hand around that bend, inched further away in upper stretch before being coaxed entering the final furlong, and continued to pull away handily. RAMMER JAMMER cleared early on, but was headed by an outer rival nearing the turn, proved no match while switching outside of that foe turning for home, failed to keep pace while hanging on his left lead nearing midstretch, and remained well clear of show. SPINSTRAWINTO GOLD saved ground while tracking in midpack, then gained show from an outer rival in upper stretch. ICE AXE was off a beat slowly, took the turn in the four path while void of speed, and made little impact. ILLUSIONED raced forwardly between a pair of rivals approaching the half mile pole, but failed to keep pace with the leaving that marker, chased in the three path around the turn, and weakened on his left lead. HE IS WORTHY broke a step slowly, showed little thereafter, and was eased through the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Spinstrawinto Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Lotz Nicholas M and Scherer Marianne
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack inside, saved ground, moved up 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Illusioned
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward 2wd btw,outpaced 1/2,chased 3p turn,wknd,left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Vale
ENTRY.COMMENT: hop/step slw st,press 3w,led 2w3/8,cleard inhand,coaxd1/8,handily

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Axe
ENTRY.COMMENT: beat slow start, far back 4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: He Is Worthy
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, showed little, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Rammer Jammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early,headed ins winner 7/16,no match,left lead,2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 52000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $13,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000. Four Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Olde r, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since December 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Races Where Entered For $35,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses T hat Have Not Started For Less Than $40,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile and One Sixteenth.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRAIL RIDGE ROAD tracked in midpack two wide and between horses, shifted four wide in upper stretch, rallied on his left lead to take aim on the leader entering the final sixteenth, and forged an advantage late. SOFT TOUCH set the pace, maintained a margin through midstretch, but was bested by an outer bidder in the shadow of the wire. FLATTER ME SILLY settled off of the pace in the two to three paths, swung six wide entering the lane, and rallied willingly to reach show late. RUSSIAN MAFIA tracked along the inside, pursued from the pocket around the far turn, tipped outside of the leader in upper stretch, but lacked a kick to produce a bid, chased into the final sixteenth, but was outkicked for show in the closing stages. BE UP was hung in midpack four wide, fanned five wide entering the lane, but lacked a rally. LAURA'S CHARM stalked outside of the pace setter, chased between horses while floated three wide in upper stretch, then failed to change leads before yielding through the final furlong. DREAMWORKER tracked three wide, but yielded between horses around the far turn. WATRUGONNADOKAREN trailed in the three to four paths, and got outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Soft Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, held sway upper, tested late, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Mafia
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, pocket 2nd, 2w3/16, lacked kick, outkicked show late

ENTRY.NAME: Laura's Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd, chased 3wd btwn 3/16, left lead, yielded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Flatter Me Silly
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, 3p2nd, 6wd 1/4, rallied, up show late

ENTRY.NAME: Trail Ridge Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 2wd btwn, 4wd upper, grind, left lead, bid 1/16, up

ENTRY.NAME: Watrugonnadokaren
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 3p, 4p2nd, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamworker
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, yielded btwn 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Be Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 4wd, 5wd 1/4, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 13, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 13 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Races Where Entered For $ 10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZION laid close up inside of the leading pair early on, backed off to stalk nearing the turn, tipped outside of the them in upper stretch, grinded away to bid for the lead along with an outer rival in the final furlong, and narrowly prevailed. AVAILABLE STAR tracked two wide and between horses, shifted four wide entering the lane, grinded away while hanging on her left lead, bid along with an inner rival approaching the final sixteenth, but was outkicked. COACH KENNY vied for the lead three to two wide, led entering the lane, inched clear on his left lead approaching midstretch, but yielded to a pair of outer bidders at the sixteenth pole. CHEROKEE TAKEOVER lagged behind around the turn, then stayed on to reach fourth late. AFLEET ASCENT vied for the lead two wide and between horses before clearing an inner rival nearing the turn, but was headed by his outer counterpart entering the lane, and gave way on his left lead. NO PEDIGREE bumped with an inner rival at the start, tracked four wide, floated five wide entering the lane, and faded. SABER RUN bumped an outer foe at the start, chased three wide and between horses, then yielded while fanning to the seven path entering the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Available Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd btwn, 4w1/4, left lead, bid 1/16, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged behind, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Saber Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, chased 3wd btwn, yielded 7p1/4

ENTRY.NAME: No Pedigree
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, tracked 4wd, 5wd 1/4, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Zion
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up ins, stalked turn, 3wd upr, bid btwn 1/16, up

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Ascent
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2wd btwn, ins foe turn, headed 1/4, gave way, left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3wd, 2wd turn, led 1/4, let lead, outkicked 1/16
